segments.text: The risks in this kitchen are really starting to stand out to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is becoming increasingly wet and slippery from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone, especially the children, could easily slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost visualize the accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit sad to think of potential injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes would also be a likely outcome if someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy is on is tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see its legs are very unstable, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle it hasn't tipped over already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains completely oblivious to these mounting dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calm demeanor is almost unsettling given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
